item.title: 做空者瞄准 2024 年最热门科技股，AppLovin 下跌 14
item.description: 两家做空机构发布了有关 AppLovin 公司的报告，导致这家为应用程序开发商提供营销服务的公司股价下跌高达 14%。【原文：Two short sellers released reports on AppLovin Corp, touching off a rout of as much as 14% in shares of the company that provides marketing services to app developers.】

item.title: FTX 9.5 亿美元的破产费用是雷曼事件以来最昂贵的费用之一
item.description: FTX 的破产成本接近 10 亿美元，使 Sam Bankman-Fried 的加密货币企业的破产成为美国历史上破产保护成本最高的案件之一。【原文：The cost of FTX’s bankruptcy is approaching $1 billion, cementing the implosion of Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto enterprise as one of costliest Chapter 11 cases in US history.】

item.title: 每月有十亿人在 YouTube 上观看播客
item.description:
该视频网站已超越 Spotify，成为美国最受欢迎的播客平台

。【原文：

The video site has leapfrogged Spotify to become the most popular podcasting platform in the US

】

item.title: 巴克莱分析师预测劳埃德将获得巨额资本回报
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的分析师认为，劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）的基本面 "非常好，不容忽视"，他们预测这家英国银行到 2027 年将向股东返还近一半的市值。【原文：The fundamentals on offer at Lloyds Banking Group Plc are “too good to ignore,” according to Barclays Plc analysts, who predict the UK bank could return almost half of its market value to shareholders by 2027.】

item.title: 加纳可可运抵量增长 70%，原因是收成较好，走私受到打击
item.description: 加纳的可可入库量比上一季度增长了约 70%，这主要得益于收成的增加，以及这个第二大可可豆生产国为减少走私所做的努力。【原文：Ghana’s cocoa deliveries to warehouses are running roughly 70% ahead of last season helped by an increased harvest and efforts to reduce smuggling in the second-biggest producer of the bean.】

item.title: 澳大利亚首次购房者的抵押贷款压力激增
item.description: 据澳大利亚房地产咨询公司Domain Holdings Australia Ltd.称，由于利率仍然居高不下，房价居高不下，澳大利亚大多数大城市都报告称首次购房者的抵押贷款压力很大。【原文：Most major Australian cities are reporting mortgage stress among first-time home buyers due to still-elevated interest rates and ultra-high prices, according to property consultancy Domain Holdings Australia Ltd.】

item.title: 埃尔德里奇信贷臂为英国学生公寓贷款 2 亿英镑
item.description: 学生公寓提供商维塔集团控股有限公司（Vita Group Holdings Ltd.）已从埃尔德里奇资本管理公司（Eldridge Capital Management）的房地产信贷部门获得超过 2 亿英镑（2.54 亿美元）的债务融资，用于在伦敦金丝雀码头区建造一座 48 层的高楼。【原文：Student housing provider Vita Group Holdings Ltd. has secured more than £200 million ($254 million) in debt financing from Eldridge Capital Management’s real estate credit arm to build a 48-story tower in London’s Canary Wharf neighborhood.】

item.title: 英伟达的人工智能热潮为戴尔等合作伙伴带来了财富，但也付出了代价
item.description: 当戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc. ）完成向埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 初创公司供应服务器的 50 亿美元交易时，这将标志着这家拥有 40 年历史的计算机销售商取得了巨大的胜利。【原文：When Dell Technologies Inc. completes a $5 billion deal to supply servers to Elon Musk’s xAI startup, it will mark an immense win for the 40-year-old computer seller.】

item.title: 巴菲特选择日本贸易公司为特朗普提供对冲
item.description:
崇光商社的多元化投资组合可能有助于投资者抵御美国总统贸易政策引发的市场动荡。【原文：

The diverse portfolios of the Sogo Shosha may help shield investors from some of the market turbulence sparked by the US president’s trade policies.

】

item.title: 据说葡萄牙将在三月中旬获得有关 TAP 的估值报告
item.description: 葡萄牙政府预计将在 3 月中旬之前收到两份关于 TAP SA 估值的独立报告，这是推进这家国有航空公司私有化的关键一步。【原文：Portugal’s government is expected to receive two independent reports on the valuation of TAP SA by the middle of March, a key step before moving ahead with the privatization of the state-owned carrier.】

item.title: 马约尔称欧洲央行寻求加快银行资本模型审批速度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一位高级官员表示，该监管机构正在努力加快评估贷款机构对其财务实力的计算，这一举措可能会改善与该行业的紧张关系。【原文：A top European Central Bank official said the watchdog is working to speed up its assessments of lenders’ calculations of their financial strength, a step that may improve strained relations with the industry.】

item.title: 欧洲夏季天然气溢价因乌克兰谈判和天气原因而下降
item.description: 随着对供应前景以及结束乌克兰战争的谈判的乐观情绪升温，欧洲今年夏季交付的天然气价格终于接近明年冬季的价格，而溢价正趋向于零。【原文：European natural gas for delivery this summer is finally getting closer to prices for next winter — with the premium inching toward zero — as optimism rises about the supply outlook as well as talks to end the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 肯尼亚向投资者提供 10.5% 的收益率以转换为较长期的债务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，肯尼亚正在向投资者提供约 10.5% 的收益率，让他们将较短期的债券换成 2036 年到期的新债券，以平滑其债务状况。【原文：Kenya is offering investors a yield of around 10.5% to swap out of shorter-dated bonds into new notes with a 2036 maturity as the country seeks to smooth out its debt profile, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国科技复兴的希望因缺乏创新而停滞不前
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，克里斯蒂娜-基里亚索格洛（Christina Kyriasoglou）将探讨德国周日全国大选后的科技产业前景。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou looks at prospects for the tech industry in Germany after the country’s national elections on Sunday.】

item.title: 地缘政治丛林大火威胁二十国集团的全球多边主义
item.description: 我是高级经济编辑布伦丹-默里（Brendan Murray），在开普敦为您报道。今天我们将关注在开普敦举行的二十国集团（G-20）财长会议。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Brendan Murray, a senior economics editor reporting from Cape Town. item.title: 美国码头工人合同被称为全球港口的 "黄金标准
item.description: 去年 10 月导致美国集装箱贸易半数停滞的码头工人工会已投票批准了与雇主签订的新劳动合同。一位工会负责人称这份协议是全球港口的 "黄金标准"。【原文：The dockworker union that brought half of US container trade to a halt last October has voted to ratify a new labor contract with their employers. A union chief called the deal the “gold standard” for ports globally.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率降至 6.88%，为今年最低水平
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周降至今年最低水平，但不足以刺激贷款活动反弹。【原文：US mortgage rates dropped last week to the lowest level this year, but not enough to spur a rebound lending activity.】

item.title: 美国共和党希望星链公司从拜登 420 亿美元互联网计划中分一杯羹
item.description: 当美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）投入 420 亿美元支持在全美普及高速互联网时，他承诺将采用老式方法--铺设绵延数英里的光纤线路。【原文：When President Joe Biden put $42 billion behind making high-speed internet accessible across the US, he committed to doing it the old-fashioned way – with miles upon miles of fiber-optic lines.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚总统押注务实组合能挽救他的遗产
item.description: 古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）在社交媒体上与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大打出手，与哥伦比亚的能源产业对立，扰乱了哥伦比亚的医疗保健系统，并冒着经济崩溃的风险。现在，这位左派领导人正在尝试一种新的策略，希望在其总统任期的最后 18 个月里在哥伦比亚留下自己的印记。【原文：Gustavo Petro has antagonized Colombia’s energy industry, disrupted its health-care system and risked economic ruin in a social-media spat with Donald Trump. Now the leftist leader is trying a new tack to leave his mark on the country in the last 18 months of his presidency.】

item.title: Blackstone 为最新的能源转型基金融资 56 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 已为一个专门投资于向更清洁能源过渡的基金筹集了 56 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. has raised $5.6 billion for a fund dedicated to investing in the transition to cleaner energy, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Lead Edge Capital 在伦敦设立办事处，计划拓展欧洲市场
item.description: 成长型股权投资公司 Lead Edge Capital 在美国以外开设了第一家办事处，以加强其在欧洲的业务。【原文：Growth equity firm Lead Edge Capital opened its first office outside the US in an effort to enhance its presence in Europe.】

item.title: 德国 2 月电力成本飙升，行业雪上加霜
item.description: 风力发电量的下滑将德国的电价推向了一年中这一时期的创纪录水平，因为能源成本仍然是欧洲最大经济体的选民和各行各业极为关注的问题。【原文：A slump in wind power generation is pushing Germany’s electricity prices to record levels for this time of year, as energy costs remain a critical concern for voters and industries in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: S.非洲新建发电厂数量创历史新高
item.description: 南非电力监管机构去年登记了创纪录的 501 个新发电设施，以增加供应，避免再次出现定期滚动停电。【原文：South Africa’s power regulator registered a record 501 new generation facilities last year in a bid to boost supply and stave off the return of regular rolling blackouts.】

item.title: Spotify 首席执行官敦促欧盟打击藐视大科技法的苹果公司
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 首席执行官丹尼尔-埃克（Daniel Ek）指责苹果公司一直藐视欧盟的大科技规则，从而升级了与苹果公司的长期争执。【原文：Spotify Technology SA’s Chief Executive Officer Daniel Ek escalated a long-time row with Apple Inc. after he accused it of consistently flouting the European Union’s Big Tech rules.】

item.title: 英伟达迎来最关键的财报日
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）的财报已成为华尔街每年最重要的事件之一。在 DeepSeek 颠覆了人工智能基础设施的前景之后，它的最新财报可能是迄今为止最关键的一次。【原文：Nvidia earnings have become some of the most important events of the year for Wall Street. And it’s latest results may be its most critical yet, coming after DeepSeek scrambled the outlook for AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 以色列中央银行建议拨款 8.41 亿美元用于战争援助
item.description: 以色列中央银行建议贷款人在未来两年内留出多达 30 亿谢克尔（约合 8410 亿美元）的资金，用于为因战争造成的经济损失而苦苦挣扎的公民提供福利。【原文：Israel’s central bank is advising lenders to put aside as much as 3 billion shekels ($841 billion) over the next two years, to be spent on benefits for citizens struggling with the economic outcomes of war.】

item.title: 西班牙国防冠军将为投资者提供计划一瞥
item.description: Indra Sistemas SA 公司的新任执行主席将向投资者介绍他的计划，即加快公司从技术转向国防的步伐，这也是西班牙打造国家冠军的更广泛愿望的一部分。【原文：Indra Sistemas SA’s new executive chairman is set to offer investors a glimpse of his plan to accelerate the company’s pivot to defense from technology, part of Spain’s broader aspirations to build a national champion.】

item.title: Nextalia 据称将探索出售意大利财富管理公司 Firstance
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Nextalia 正在探索意大利财富科技公司 Firstance 的各种选择，包括可能的出售。【原文：Private equity firm Nextalia is exploring options for Italian wealth tech firm Firstance including a possible sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DWS 称德国股市将因强劲盈利而继续反弹
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）资产管理部门 DWS 集团欧洲股票联席主管马库斯-波普（Marcus Poppe）表示，大选后德国股市可能会继续反弹，因为盈利依然强劲，估值仍然便宜。【原文：German stocks will likely keep rallying after the election as earnings remain strong and valuations are still cheap, said Marcus Poppe, co-head of European equities at DWS Group, the asset management arm of Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: DeepSeek 下调非高峰期价格以平衡人工智能需求
item.description: DeepSeek 在非高峰时段提供高达 75% 的折扣，以减少对其应用程序编程接口的需求高峰。【原文：DeepSeek is offering discounts of up to 75% during off-peak hours to reduce spikes in demand for its application programming interface.】
